body.scriptCode: var url = space.new_image_picture_nasa.GalleryURL; var title = space.new_image_picture_nasa.ImageTitle; var preview_text = space.new_image_picture_nasa.Description; ios_reading_list.create_reading_list_item.setUrl(url); ios_reading_list.create_reading_list_item.setTitle(title); ios_reading_list.create_reading_list_item.setPreviewText(preview_text);
